metadata.name: Burning
metadata.description:
When I was a child, I didn't have the opportunity to talk to my father, to tell him something or share my fantasies with him because he wasn't there by my side. I grew up without parents from the age of 3. Now that I have son, one of the most important things for me is to be close to him. To talk and listen to his stories and fantasies. He's 3 years old and started talking at the age of 2. For about a year now, talking to him has been one of my favorite activities. We chat about his made-up stories, discuss and so on. So one day I got the idea to visualize these conversations into pictures through AI (mostly in 90’s style). Luca is 3 years old and his father is Hrant, 36 years old.


   License:
